abstract: There have been 13 cases and three deaths from plague in the United States in the past five months. In a typical year, there are three cases annually.

headline.main: Plague Cases in U.S. on the Rise
headline.print_headline: A Burst of U.S. Plague Cases

snippet: There have been 13 cases and three deaths from plague in the United States in the past five months. In a typical year, there are three cases annually.
